skill.name: Pulverize
skill.desc: Alistar slams the ground underneath his target, dealing magic damage and knocking them up for 1.5 seconds. He then roars, healing himself and the lowest health ally champion for 20% of his maximum health.

skill.name: Burst Shield
skill.desc: Annie blasts a cone of fire, dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a Health shield on herself for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Weapons of the Faithful
skill.desc:
Player select a weapon when place Aphelios on board.

Binding Eclipse
Aphelios casts forth a lunar spotlight towards the largest group of units, dealing physical damage and stunning all enemies in the area.

Duskwave
Aphelios unleashes a wave of energy in a cone in his target's direction, dealing magic damage to all units hit and locking on to them. After a delay, Aplhelios fires a volley of attacks at each locked-on target, dealing physical damage.

Onslaught
Aphelion enters an onslaught for 1.75 seconds, automatically performing 6 attacks over the duration at the nearest 2 enemies, dealing physical damage to each enemy.
stats: Binding Eclipse Percent of Attack Damage: 150% / 150% / 1500%

skill.name: Ranger's Focus
skill.desc: Ashe gains Attack Damage for the next 4 seconds.

skill.name: Meteor Shower
skill.desc: Aurelion Sol calls down meteors on random enemies that explode on impact. Each meteor deals magic damage and applies a burn for 10 seconds, dealing % of the target's maximum Health as true damage and reducing incoming healing by 33%.

skill.name: Endless Banquet
skill.desc:
Bel'Veth dashes around her target and unleashes a flurry of attacks, each dealing physical damage.

Each time this is cast, Bel'Veth gains 25% bouns Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Static Defenses
skill.desc: Blitzcrank creates an empowered field around himself, reducing all damage taken by for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Tactical Sweep
skill.desc:
Camille sweeps with her leg, dealing physical damage and Disarming enemies hit for a few seconds.

Disarm: target cannot move or attack

skill.name: Cosmic Bellow
skill.desc:
Passive: +75 Magic Resist

Active: Cho'gath breathes a cosmic beam in a forward arc that deals magic damage and Mana Reaves the target.

Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana util the next cast

skill.name: Whirling Death
skill.desc: Draven hurls 2 massive axes at his target's direction, which reverse on the way back to him. Enemies caught in their path take physical damage, reduced by 25% for each enemy they have already passed through.

skill.name: Star Diver
skill.desc: Ekko dives in, granting himself a shield for 5 seconds and taunts nearby enemies. When the shield breaks, he emits a time field, dealing damage to nearby enemies and slowing their attack speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

skill.name: Sabotage
skill.desc:
Ezreal fires an orb of physical sabotage at his target, Chilling them for 4 seconds. Then he fires another shot, which deals magic damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

skill.name: Dark Harvest
skill.desc: Fiddlesticks teleports into the largest cluster of enemies and fears them. For the next a few seconds, Fiddle drains the life from nearby enemies dealing magic damage per second and healing himself for 20% of the damage dealt.

skill.name: En Garde!
skill.desc: Fiora lunges at her enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. For the next 8 seconds, she takes 15% less damage and her attacks restore Health.

skill.name: Outta My Way!
skill.desc: Galio dashes toward the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. He then grants himself and the closest ally Health shield for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Trial by Fire
skill.desc:
Gangplank sheds crowd control effects, then fires a flaming bullet at his target. It deals magic damage and Wounds the enemy for 8 seconds.

Wound: reduces healing received by 33%

skill.name: Twister!
skill.desc: Janna sends a twister towards the largest group of enemies. The twister expands when it reaches its destination, knocking all nearby enemies up in the air, Stunning them for 1.5 seconds, and dealing 70 magic damage each second for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Adaptive Strike
skill.desc: Passive: Jax leaps to his target and deals bonus magic damage every 3rd attack. The bonus damage increases every third attack up to 7 times.

skill.name: Fishbones
skill.desc:
Jinx fires a rocket at her target that explodes on impact, damaging all nearby enemies for magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

skill.name: Starcharged
skill.desc:
Passive: Kai'Sa's attacks apply Plasma. Her next attack against a target with 2 stacks of Plasma deal magic damage.

Active: Kai'Sa gains Attack Speed for 10 seconds. This bonus stacks!

skill.name: Starfire Spellblade
skill.desc: Kayle's next 3 attacks deal physical damage to her target, and magic damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target.

skill.name: Sigil of Malice
skill.desc: Leblanc fires sigils at her target each dealing magic damage. If the target dies, she completes casting the remaining sigils at the nearest enemy but adds 1 more sigil.

skill.name: Safeguard
skill.desc:
Lee Sin dashes towards a nearby ally, shielding them and himself for 4 seconds. He then dashes back and deals physical damage to his target.

If there are no nearby allies, he gains more health shield instead.

skill.name: Deus Ex Machina
skill.desc:
Leona locks onto and calls an orbital laser strike onto her target.

After a short delay a laser fires on the locked on target dealing true damage per second to the target and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Glitterlance
skill.desc: Lulu fires a magic bolt at her target, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and to other enemies behind.

skill.name: Lucent Singularity
skill.desc:
Lux sends out a singularity to random enemy. When it detonates, it reduces the target's Attack Damage by 40% for 4 seconds, 
and deals to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Ground Slam
skill.desc: Malphite slams the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and granting himself Armor for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Bullet Time
skill.desc: Miss Fortune fires 8 waves of bullets in her target's direction within channels for 2 seconds. Enemies take magic damage from the first bullet that hits them, and less magic damage from any other bullets that hit.

skill.name: Skylines
skill.desc:
Mordekaiser transports the arena into his realm for a few seconds. He Shreds ALL enemies, then slams a building onto the arena that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

Shred: reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Bonk!
skill.desc:
Nasus slams his staff on his target dealing physical damage and Chilling them for 3 seconds.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed by 40%

skill.name: Apotheosis
skill.desc: Nilah whirls her whip-blade. dealing magic damage to nearby enemies while healing herself and allies health over 1 seconds. She finishes with a burst that deals magic damage.

skill.name: Biggest Roboball Ever!
skill.desc:
Passive: Nunu and Willump slowly roll a ball around the board, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through, and gaining 30 mana per second.

NuNu and Willump grow the ball, increashing their speed, radius of the ball, and its damage dealt by 40%.

skill.name: Buckler Toss
skill.desc: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing % of her Armor as magic damage. The buckler then bounces back. granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Sand Slam
skill.desc:
Passive: +50 Armor

Active: Rammus powers himself up and leaps to the largest group of nearby enemies, dealing magic damage, knocking them up for 1.25 seconds, and reducing their Attack Damage by 40% for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Iron Bond
skill.desc: Rell forms a tether between herself and her lowest percent Health ally, dealing magic damage to all enemies between herself and her bound ally. She also grants herself and her bound ally % of Rell's current Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Dominus
skill.desc: Renekton empowers himself for 8 seconds, gaining maximun Health, and causing his attacks to deal 6% of his maximum Health as bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Bunny Blade
skill.desc: Riven gains a Health shield for 4 seconds and empowers her next 3 attacks with bonus magic damage. If Riven has more Health than than her target, she deals 100% more bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Flair
skill.desc: Samira rapidly firing bullets that deal physical damage for 1.5 seconds. Bullets ricochet to nearby enemies, for 20% less damage.

skill.name: Cryo Grenade
skill.desc:
Sejuani throws a cryo grenade at the closest enemy that explodes after a 2-second delay. Enemies within a 3-hex radius are Stunned and take magic damage.

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

skill.name: Piercing Darkness
skill.desc: Senna fires a laser beam in the direction of a nearby enemy. dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line.

skill.name: Mecha SLAM!
skill.desc: Sett gains a Health shield and becomes immune to crowd control for 2 seconds. He charges up while the shield is active; when the shield breaks or expires, he deals physical in a cone to all enemies caught within the blast. The blast damage increases depending on how long Sett was charged up.

skill.name: Pizza Delivery
skill.desc: Sivir throws her pizza at her target, dealing physical damage. It then splits into slices and gets delivered to the nearest allies, healing them.

skill.name: Crescendo Sequence
skill.desc:
Sona fires 2 beams that cycle between 3 phases:

1: Deals magic damage to the nearest enemies
2. Heals the lowest health allies
3. Deals magic damage to the nearest enemies and Stuns them

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

skill.name: Starcall
skill.desc: Soraka launches a star at her target, which deals magic damage and heals Soraka for 8% of her maximum Health. Every 3 casts, she launches stars at each of the nearest enemies.

skill.name: Battle Blast
skill.desc: Sylas whirls his chains around him, healing himself for health and dealing  magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Force of Will
skill.desc: Syndra enshrounds a random unit on your bench in an orb, granting them a health shield and fllinging them onto the board towards the closest enemy, knocking up and dealing magic damage to any enemies hit. Traits are unaffected except Corrupted.

skill.name: Weaver's Wall
skill.desc: Taliyah summon a torrent of spiraling rocks in a line of enemy units, dealing magic damage to all enemies it hits. After a brief delay, the wall explodes, dealing additional magic damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: OX-ian Diplomacy
skill.desc: Talon jumps to the furthest unit from the center of the board and stabs them magic damage. If this kills them, Talon heals.

skill.name: Undertow
skill.desc:
Passive: Urgot's claw fires 5 attacks per second, each dealing physical damage.

Active: Urgot summons a gigantic wave behind his enemies that deals % of their maximum Health as magic damage. The wave knocks enemies forward 1 hex, Stuns them, and has a chance to dredge up treasure (gold and loot).

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

skill.name: Silver Bolt
skill.desc: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at her target, dealing true damage.

skill.name: Frozen Tomb
skill.desc:
Vel'koz Stun the enemy champion that has dealt the most damage this round for a few seconds, dealing magic damage to them.

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

skill.name: Blast Shield
skill.desc:
Vi grants herself a Health shield for 4 seconds and Sunders nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Then she deals dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

Sunder: reduce Armor

skill.name: Heartbreaker
skill.desc: Viego becomes unstoppable, leaping to the largest cluster of nearby enemies and slamming his sword down on the enemy with the lowest Health, dealing magic damage to the primary target and magic damage to enemies nearby. If Viego kills an enemy, he casts again with reduced damage.

skill.name: Stone Skin
skill.desc: Wukong spins his staff around him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. He gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy hit for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Steel Tempest
skill.desc: Yasuo fires a whirlwind at his target dealing magic damage and knocking up units hit for a few seconds. If the current position isn't ideal, he will dash up to 1 hex to find more units in a line.

skill.name: Prowling Projectile
skill.desc: Yuumi fires a curved missile at the furthest target in her attack range, dealing magic damage to the first unit hit.

skill.name: Symbiotic Split
skill.desc:
Passive: Upon dying, split into smaller Zac Blobs with % of Zac's maximum Health that taunt nearby enemies.

Active: Zac bounces into the air and slams down, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. Then he heals 30% of his missing Health.

skill.name: Empowered Kill Mode
skill.desc:
Zed teleports behind his target and Sunders Armor for a few seconds and enters KILL Mode for a few seconds: Attacks deal bonus physical damage and every 3rd attack deals physical damage to all adjacent enemies.

Sunder: reduce Armor

skill.name: Trouble Bubble
skill.desc: Zoe launches a bubble at the nearest non-infected enemy, infecting them with a virus that deals magic damage over 10 seconds. Infected enemies take more damage.
